title: KINDRED
body:
Has Anyone thought of any good skin concepts for kindred?
or could someone make a concept art for a god killer kindred skin?

replies.body:
[Not my art or Idea, but one I FULLY support]

http://pre00.deviantart.net/1260/th/pre/f/2016/029/8/2/8239d54f57f59c8172a42b75fe84d2ad-d9ptc8x.jpg

I so wish that was an actual kindred skin 

It would be the best
